title: Log in issue
body:
Does anyone have a log in issue?
Im try my account for two days, but every times im log in, it took a long time to wait, when it does, it say im have an unexpected error while logging in, i check my network and it work normal, but still can't log in.
Any one know how to fix it ?

replies.body: I don't see that there were any logins issues during this time.  Your connection might be having troubel reaching the authetnication servers, and resulted in that error.  Try out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  Let me know if it helps.
ive had the same problem for weeks now no way to fix seems i just lost my account i had for years
